MiguelMota/portfolio/MRGPropertiesInc

Logo and website design for MRG Properties Inc., a real estate business. They wanted a simple, clean and user friendly website and a logo that says what they're all about. The home on the logo also represents the letter M for MRG [Melendez Realty Group]. I used the Trajan font family.

www.mrgpropertiesinc.com May 2011
